version_description:
Added Next Payout loading bar.
Better support for iPad.

Minor visual improvements and small bug fixes to make the app better, faster, stronger.

Added Next Payout loading bar.
Better support for iPad.

Minor visual improvements and small bug fixes to make the app better, faster, stronger.

Added Next Payout loading bar.
Better support for iPad.

Minor visual improvements and small bug fixes to make the app better, faster, stronger.
Updated UI, fixed some minor bugs & added better support for iPad.
Updated UI, fixed some minor bugs & added better support for iPad.
Updated UI, fixed some minor bugs & added better support for iPad.

With this new update you can now view individual worker history for hashrates and shares.
We added notification settings so you can turn them on and off when you want.
You can also set a minimum hashrate threshold and when a worker drops below that hashrate, a notification will be sent.

We added a new language, Romanian! Also, we fixed a couple of the other translations.
A bunch of small fixes have been applied to make the app faster and smoother.
